import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Table, Button, Badge, Form, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'; const Inventory = () => { const [showAddModal, setShowAddModal] = useState(false); const [inventory] = useState([ { id: 1, name: 'Engine Oil', category: 'Fluids', stock: 45, minStock: 20, price: 25 }, { id: 2, name: 'Air Filter', category: 'Filters', stock: 15, minStock: 10, price: 15 }, { id: 3, name: 'Spark Plugs', category: 'Ignition', stock: 8, minStock: 5, price: 45 }, { id: 4, name: 'Brake Pads', category: 'Brakes', stock: 5, minStock: 8, price: 35 }, ]); const getStockStatus = (stock, minStock) => { if (stock === 0) return { variant: 'danger', text: 'Out of Stock' }; if (stock < minStock) return { variant: 'warning', text: 'Low Stock' }; return { variant: 'success', text: 'In Stock' }; }; return (

); }; export default Inventory;
